content: **this christmas pudding mosaic motif is part of the christmas in july mosaic blanket cal 1 afflink hosted by juniper & oakes ** celebrate the season with a sweet slice of traditional british holiday charm this festive motif features a stylized christmas pudding worked in overlay mosaic crochet it s the perfect blend of nostalgic and modern and a lovely way to add a playful touch to your christmas crochet projects yarn info yardage listed is for a single-sided version of the motif only pattern details - overlay mosaic crochet - full written and graphical instructions - single-sided and reversible instructions - large print version included about the cal this design is part of a collaborative cal featuring 8 designers two new sections are released each week throughout july 2025 ✨ how to join the cal follow along for free 2 afflink each section will be shared on the designers blogs on its release date get a head start purchase the full cal ebook 3 afflink and access all of the sections right away hosted by juniper & oakes whether you re joining in for the fun or looking for a festive motif to use on its own this cheerful design will get you in the holiday spirit well before december rolls around you may sell the blankets that you crochet by following this pattern on a small scale provided that you credit elimee designs as the pattern designer mass production is not
